summary: This document appears to be a daily assignment log or quarterly schedule for a staff member named 'Noel, T' at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, NY, covering dates in July and August 2019. It details shift assignments, leave, and overtime, and is significant as it provides a record of staff activity at the facility where Jeffrey Epstein was held prior to his death.

locations: MCC New York, New York, NY
keyFacts: This is a staff assignment log for a correctional officer (Noel, T) at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York for the third quarter of 2019.
The log details specific unit assignments (SHU #1, SHU #2, SHU #3, 9 NORTH, UNIT 2, 10 SOUTH #1), shift types (P/M, EAN, ON, VW, MAN, OTD/W), leave (sick leave, day off), and overtime.
The document covers the period from late July to mid-August 2019, which includes the time leading up to and immediately following Jeffrey Epstein's death in custody on August 10, 2019.
The record indicates the staff member was on sick leave on August 10, 2019 (the date of Epstein's death), and also had a short overtime assignment to SHU #1 that day.
This type of document is relevant for understanding staff deployment and potential security protocols at the MCC during the period Epstein was incarcerated.
